segments.text: Bill and Betty have already grown up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can still remember our first date .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at that big tree over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , oh my god ! It ’ s still there . We have our first date right on there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know that I fell in love with you at the first sight then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You seemed to be dull at that time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you agreed to go out with me at last .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( Smile ) I can ’ t believe this for it ’ s been 20 years since we got married .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So do you feel happy now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I couldn ’ t have been any happier !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , we are the happiest family in the world .
segments.speaker: S2
